sentences.en: Brad Pitt steals the show as the young man doomed by his zest for life.
sentences.cn: 布拉德·皮特扮演一名因对生命怀有极大热情而注定在劫难逃的年轻人，抢尽了镜头。

sentences.en: Finely grate about a teaspoon of orange zest and put aside.
sentences.cn: 将橙皮擦出大约一茶匙的细末待用。
他满腔热情地参加了运动.

sentences.en: He had a great zest for life .
sentences.cn: 他对生命有着极大的热情。

sentences.en: He has a zest for life and a quick intellect.
sentences.cn: 他对生活充满热情，思维敏捷。

sentences.en: He retired from professional chess because he had lost the zest for winning.
sentences.cn: 他退出了职业国际象棋赛场，因为他已经对获胜毫无兴致。

sentences.en: Last month's victory has given him a renewed zest for the game.
sentences.cn: 上个月的胜利重新唤起他对这项运动的热情.

sentences.en: Live interviews add zest and a touch of the unexpected to any piece of research.
sentences.cn: 现场采访会为各种调查增添趣味性和些许新奇感。

sentences.en: Mix the rest of the olive oil with the zest and juice of the lemon.
sentences.cn: 将其余的橄榄油和柠檬皮及柠檬汁混合在一起。

sentences.en: She sparkles, and has as much zest as a person half her age.
sentences.cn: 她才华横溢，而且像只有她一半岁数的年轻人一样充满热情。

sentences.en: The danger of being caught added a certain zest to the affair.
sentences.cn: 被捉奸的危险为这件风流韵事增添了一些刺激性。

sentences.en: The love affair added a little zest to her life.
sentences.cn: 这次恋爱给她的生命增添了一些生趣.

sentences.en: The outer skin of the orange is called the "zest".
They love her practical attitude to life, her zest and wit.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢她务实的人生态度、她的热情和幽默。

sentences.en: We tucked into the food with zest.
We were free and full of the zest of darers.
sentences.cn: 我们无拘无束并洋溢着敢斗者的热情.
